notes.note:
Improvements to Lockwise, our integrated password manager:
- Firefox now recognizes subdomains and will autofill domain logins from Lockwise 
- [Integrated breach alerts][1] from Firefox Monitor are now available to users with screen readers


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/firefox-lockwise-alerte-fuites-donnees-stes-web

More information about Enhanced Tracking Protection in action:
 - Notifications when Firefox blocks cryptominers
 - A running tally of blocked trackers in the protection panel accessed by clicking the address bar shield

[Picture-in-picture video comes to Firefox for Windows][1]: Select the blue icon from the right edge of a video to pop open a floating window so you can keep watching while working in other tabs. Learn how the feature works.


  [1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/blog/2019/12/3/news-from-firefox-on-mobile-private-network-and-desktop/#PiP
Native MP3 decoding on Windows, Linux, macOS, and Android

Extension popup windows now include the extension name instead of its moz-extension:// url when using the [windows.create][1] API


  [1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Mozilla/Add-ons/WebExtensions/API/windows/create

Firefox will now ship with [Catalan (Valencian) (ca-valencia), Tagalog (tl), and Triqui (trs)][1]


  [1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/l10n/2019/11/21/l10n-report-november-edition-3/

Added support for developers, including:
- DevTools’ Network panel can now [inspect WebSocket messages][1] and automatically formats a variety of framework formats
- Console’s new [multi-line editor mode][2] provides an IDE-like experience that makes it convenient to iterate on longer code snippets
- The Network panel’s new [resource blocking][3] can simulate the impact of tracking protection, security, service outages, and bad connectivity for more robust testing
- More features and improvements can be found every release in DevTools’ “What’s New” panel in en-US


  [1]: https://hacks.mozilla.org/2019/10/firefoxs-new-websocket-inspector/
  [2]: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Tools/Web_Console/The_command_line_interpreter#Multi-line_mode
  [3]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Tools/Network_Monitor/request_list#Blocking_specific_URLs

New videos every week on the [Mozilla Developer YouTube channel][1]  


  [1]: http://youtube.com/MozillaDeveloper
Improvements to the website certificate viewer, with more features and more detailed information
Extension-registered devtools panels now interact better with screen readers

New [kiosk mode][1] functionality, which allows maximum screen space for customer-facing displays


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/firefox-enterprise-kiosk-mode

system_requirements:
## Windows

### Operating Systems (32-bit and 64-bit)
 - Windows 7
 - Windows 8
 - Windows 10

### Recommended Hardware
-  Pentium 4 or newer processor that supports SSE2
-  512MB of RAM / 2GB of RAM for the 64-bit version
-  200MB of hard drive space

---

## Mac

### Operating Systems
- macOS 10.9
- macOS 10.10
- macOS 10.11
- macOS 10.12
- macOS 10.13
- macOS 10.14
- macOS 10.15

### Recommended Hardware
- Macintosh computer with an Intel x86 processor
- 512 MB of RAM
- 200 MB hard drive space

---

## GNU/Linux

### Software Requirements

*Please note that GNU/Linux distributors may provide packages for your distribution which have different requirements.*

- Firefox will not run at all without the following libraries or packages:
    - GTK+ 3.4 or higher
    - GLib 2.22 or higher
    - Pango 1.22 or higher
    - X.Org 1.0 or higher (1.7 or higher is recommended)
    - libstdc++ 4.6.1 or higher
- For optimal functionality, we recommend the following libraries or packages:
    - NetworkManager 0.7 or higher
    - DBus 1.0 or higher
    - GNOME 2.16 or higher
    - PulseAudio
text:
We'd like to extend a special thank you to all of the [new Mozillians][2] who contributed to this release of Firefox.

  [2]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/2019/11/25/firefox-71-new-contributors/
title: Firefox 71.0 Release
